A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is atrocious on multiple levels. However\, it looks and sounds wonderful\, so see it if you're into that. Except for the porgs. Screw those things\, they looked awful. \nThe plot is terrible\, the acting is weak\, the runtime is mind-numbingly long. I do not recommend\, whether you're a Star Wars fan or not.
